column27: Delegated grades NCPRP will be paid in October 2011 salaries. Whilst data on end-year non-consolidated awards include those awarded to staff who transferred into Cabinet Office under machinery of government changes during 2010/11, the figure for annual paybill costs do not include the costs of these staff until February 2011 when they moved onto the departmental payroll.
Delegated grades NCPRP will be paid in October 2011 salaries.
The NCPRP are the individual payments paid for Box 1 performers and relate to the year 2010/11
No NCPRP have been paid for SCS for 2010/11
